components.description: Analyze a major historical event and how it is represented on timelines from different cultural perspectives, including those of indigenous people.
Explain how themes and developments have defined eras in Washington state history from 1854 to the present.

standards.title: Understands and analyzes causal factors that have shaped major events in history.

components.description: Explain and analyze how individuals and movements have shaped Washington state history since statehood.
Explain and analyze how cultures and ethnic groups contributed to Washington state history since statehood.
Explain and analyze how technology and ideas have impacted Washington state history since statehood.

standards.title: Understands that there are multiple perspectives and interpretations of historical events.

components.description: Explain, analyze, and develop an argument about how Washington state has been impacted by individuals, movements, cultures, and technology.

standards.title: Understands how historical events inform analysis of contemporary issues and events.

components.description: Analyze how a historical event in Washington state history helps us to understand contemporary issues and events.
